task.summary: Initial version: - simple web application based on bootstrap and angularjs
- Creation of a new module 'bf-materials' - Json data are now retrieved from localStore if available (fallback to remote if not)
- Links added to craftable items (to bravefrontierglobal.wikia)
- Recipes updated with Brave Frontier RPG (EU) 1.3.0
- Fix: translation methods - Add: button to force refreshing database
- Fix: translation methods - Add: button to force refreshing database - new: Database upgraded to "Global" items (#1)
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
- Work in progress: Migration to Angular 2 and TypeScript
